description: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.

tweets.text:
The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be.     

- Marcel Pagnol https://t.co/ub4vd9oEab

Happiness is not in the mere possession of money.
it lies in the joy of achievement
in the thrill of creative effort.     

- Franklin D. Roosevelt https://t.co/dPg8RXYgQj

Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.

- Gabriel Garcia Marquez https://t.co/EvSO9roHtR

If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.

- Andrew Carnegie https://t.co/LaIJwo5NPO

Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed.
Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.     

- Denis Waitley https://t.co/tbS1brh7MQ
